attributes.action: put a  clean up tax on chewing gum which should be used to clean it off our streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: everywhere you look ,you can see discarded chewing gum, it is spat on the street, stuck on the seats of public transport or just about anywhere. by taxing it at the point of purchase then it would be the culprits that would be paying to have their own filth cleaned up.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
